item.description:
As a Special Thank You to our UPN supporters over the years, I would like to extend you a SPECIAL INVITE my Annual Appreciation Event

Jason V. Watts Annual Appreciation Event |
7th UPN All Black Affair & Food Drive -
Black Friday Nov.23rd
sponsored by Karma Tequila

For FREE Entry: Must Bring
Donations for Local Food Shelter & Arrive before 11pm
Your most Upscale All Black Attire is requested

MUST GET FREE TICKETS ONLINE AT (1st 100)
http://upnallblack7.eventbrite.com/

2 DJ's,Cocktails,Dancing,& more!

On Friday November 25th, 2005 Over 300 Urban Professionals from across Connecticut gathered Downtown on 198 Crown St. for The Inaugural Urban Professionals Network "Meet & Greet" . Through the years we have endured the test of time, and this is our night to meetup & celebrate our success. I will be hosting FREE complimentary appetizers, FREE complimentary cocktails, and FREE Admission for the 1st 100 Ticket Recipients. Join us as we network,party, and raise donations for a Local Food Bank!

MUST GET FREE TICKETS ONLINE AT (1st 100)
http://upnallblack7.eventbrite.com/

FOR VIP,BIRTHDAYS,or GROUPS
call/text 203.444.2509

Sincerely,
Jason V. Watts
item.name: {Free} UPN 7yr.Anniversary Celebration Black Friday Nov.23rd | All Black Affair
